author: Ellen Mitchell
title: Pentagon orders military bases to stop releasing specific COVID-19 numbers
description: The Pentagon has ordered military bases and combatant commands to withhold coronavirus case numbers, citing operational security concerns."As we continue to grapple with the novel nature of COVID19, we are constant...
content:
The Pentagon has ordered military bases and combatant commands to withhold coronavirus case numbers, citing operational security concerns.
